attributes.action: ask the Police to look into the fraudelent claims that MPs have made for Mortgages etc that they do not have.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that many Members of Parliment have fraudently claimed for Martgages that they no longer have, some having been paid up almost two years ago, also any MP who has fraudently claimed for expenses that they should have not done so. 
If this have been a member of the public that had done this to Council Tax or State Benifits they would be facing charges, the MPs are no different, it's all our money they are stealing from.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
